paragraphs.title: Top 100 active User
paragraphs.text:
%sql
SELECT u.userId, COUNT(u.*) WatchCount FROM user_scores u, videos v
WHERE u.videoId = v.videoId
GROUP BY userId
Order BY COUNT(*) DESC
LIMIT 100

paragraphs.title: Watch's Videos
paragraphs.text:
watchVideos = sqlContext.sql("select v.videoId, v.title, us.score, v.imageUrl, v.videoUrl from user_scores us, videos v where us.videoId = v.videoId and us.userId='{0}'".format(userId)).collect() print "%table" print "{0}\t{1}\t{2}\t{3}\t{4}".format("VideoId", "Title", "Score", "features", "image") for r in watchVideos: features = "
".join(sqlContext.sql("select feature, score from video_features where videoId='{0}'".format(r["videoId"])) \ .map(lambda r:"({0},{1})".format(r["feature"].encode("utf8"), r["score"])).collect()) print "{0}\t{1}\t{2}\t%html {3}\t%html ".format(r["videoId"], r["title"], r["score"], features, r["imageUrl"])

paragraphs.title: User's Features
paragraphs.text:
print "%table"
print "\t".join(["Feature", "Score", "Description"])

for r in sqlContext.sql("SELECT uf.feature, uf.score, f.description FROM features f, user_features uf WHERE f.name = uf.feature and userId='{0}' order by uf.score desc".format(userId)).collect():
    print "\t".join([r["feature"], str(r["score"]), str(r["description"])])

paragraphs.title: naive Version
paragraphs.text:
""" recommendate videos which has similar features Weights: Time: min(max(2 - (now - publishAt).days / 30, 0), 2) , ragion 0 to 2 complexity is O(N*U**2) """ import datetime as dt the_user_features = sqlContext.sql("SELECT uf.feature, uf.score FROM user_features uf WHERE uf.userId='{0}' order by uf.score desc".format(userId)).map(lambda r:(r["feature"], r["score"])).collectAsMap() the_user_watchedVideos = sqlContext.sql("SELECT videoId FROM user_scores WHERE userId='{0}'".format(userId)).map(lambda r: r["videoId"]).collect() scores = dict() videoId = "" vfs = sqlContext.sql("SELECT v.videoId, vf.feature, vf.score, v.startAt FROM videos v, video_features vf WHERE v.videoId=vf.videoId").collect() for vf in vfs: if vf["videoId"] in the_user_watchedVideos: continue if videoId != vf["videoId"]: videoId = vf["videoId"] scores[videoId] = dict(videoId=videoId, score=max(0., 2 - ((dt.datetime.now() - vf["startAt"]).days / 30.))) uf = the_user_features.get(vf["feature"]) if uf != None: scores[videoId]["score"] += uf - abs(vf["score"] - uf) sqlContext.createDataFrame(scores.values()).registerTempTable("naiveResult") result = sqlContext.sql("select v.videoId, v.title, v.imageUrl, v.startAt, r.score from videos v, naiveResult r where v.videoId=r.videoId order by r.score desc limit 10").collect() print "%table" print "{0}\t{1}\t{2}\t{3}\t{4}\t{5}".format("VideoId", "Title", "Score", "Time" , "features", "image") for r in result: features = "
".join(sqlContext.sql("select feature, score from video_features where videoId='{0}'".format(r["videoId"])) \ .map(lambda r:"({0},{1})".format(r["feature"].encode('utf-8').strip(), r["score"])).collect()) #features = "" print "{0}\t{1}\t{2}\t{3}\t%html {4}\t%html ".format(r["videoId"], r["title"], r["score"], r["startAt"], features, r["imageUrl"])

paragraphs.title: Matrix Factorization
paragraphs.text:
from pyspark.mllib.recommendation import MatrixFactorizationModel model = MatrixFactorizationModel.load(sc, "/cbs/TrainedModel") userIndex = sqlContext.sql("SELECT index FROM userMap WHERE userId=" + userId).first()["index"] sqlContext.createDataFrame(model.recommendProducts(userIndex, 100)).registerTempTable("mfResult") result = sqlContext.sql(""" select v.videoId, v.title, v.imageUrl, v.startAt, r.rating as score from videos v, mfResult r, videoMap vm where v.videoId=vm.videoId and r.product=vm.index order by score desc limit 10""").collect() print "%table" print "{0}\t{1}\t{2}\t{3}\t{4}\t{5}".format("VideoId", "Title", "Score", "Time" , "features", "image") for r in result: features = "
".join(sqlContext.sql("select feature, score from video_features where videoId='{0}'".format(r["videoId"])) \ .map(lambda r:"({0},{1})".format(r["feature"].encode('utf-8').strip(), r["score"])).collect()) #features = "" print "{0}\t{1}\t{2}\t{3}\t%html {4}\t%html ".format(r["videoId"], r["title"], r["score"], r["startAt"], features, r["imageUrl"])

paragraphs.text:
%sql
select v.videoId, v.title, v.imageUrl, v.startAt, r.rating as score
from videos v, mfResult r, videoMap vm
where v.videoId=vm.videoId and r.product=vm.index and EXISTS (select * from user_scores us where us.videoId=v.vidoeId and userId='1555466411')
order by score desc limit 10
